passive1.effects: Holds up to 3 charges that refill upon visiting the shop.

passive2.name: Touch of Corruption
passive2.effects: Abilities and basic attacks apply a burn that damages enemy champions for 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

passive3.effects: Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.

other.consume: For 12 seconds, regenerates 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every half-second for a total of 125 health and 75 mana as well as grants Touch of Corruption.
other.limit: Limited to one type of Potion.
